short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Site blocker - Block unwanted Sites and increase productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Site blocker: Add list of Sites to block them to increase focus on productivity. Through the Settings page, you can Add, Edit and Delete the Sites with no limit.
